report.sql-kpi: select #time#, nvl(mrbts.co_name, nvl(mrbts.co_object_instance, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')')) "MRBTS name", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts #tmp_meas_tables# where plmn.co_oc_id=16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.mrbts_gid = mrbts.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, nvl(mrbts.co_object_instance, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')'))"MRBTS name", nvl(lnbts.co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "LNBTS_TYPE", nvl(lnbts.co_name, nvl(lnbts.co_object_instance, 'NN('||lnbts.co_gid||')'))"LNBTS name", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts #tmp_meas_tables# where plmn.co_oc_id=16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.lnbts_gid = lnbts.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#
select #time#, #keys#, #kpis# from dual #tmp_meas_tables# where 1=1 #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, nvl(mrbts.co_object_instance, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')'))"MRBTS name", nvl(lnbts.co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "LNBTS_TYPE", nvl(lnbts.co_name, nvl(lnbts.co_object_instance, 'NN('||lnbts.co_gid||')'))"LNBTS name", nvl(lncel.co_name, nvl(lncel.co_object_instance, 'NN('||lncel.co_gid||')'))"LNCEL name", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts, utp_common_objects lncel #tmp_meas_tables# where plmn.co_oc_id=16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and lncel.co_oc_id=3130 and mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and lncel.co_parent_gid = lnbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.lncel_gid = lncel.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "Source PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')')"Source MRBTS name", nvl(lnbts.co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "Source LNBTS_TYPE", nvl(lnbts.co_name, 'NN('||lnbts.co_gid||')')"Source LNBTS name", nvl(lncel.co_name, 'NN('||lncel.co_gid||')')"Source LNCEL name", target.plmn_name "Target PLMN name", target.mrbts_name "Target MRBTS name", nvl(target.lnbts_co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "Target LNBTS_TYPE", target.lnbts_name "Target LNBTS name", target.lnbts_id "Target LNBTS ID", target.lncel_name "Target LNCEL name", target.lcr_id "Target LCR ID", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts, utp_common_objects lncel, (select lncel.co_gid gid, nvl (plmn.co_name, 'NN(' || plmn.co_gid || ')') plmn_name, nvl (mrbts.co_name, 'NN(' || mrbts.co_gid || ')') mrbts_name, lnbts.co_sc_name lnbts_co_sc_name, nvl (lnbts.co_name, 'NN(' || lnbts.co_gid || ')') lnbts_name, nvl (lncel.co_name, 'NN(' || lncel.co_gid || ')') lncel_name, lnbts.co_object_instance lnbts_id, lncel.co_object_instance lcr_id, C_LTE_LNCEL.LNCEL_EUTRA_CEL_ID eci, lncel.co_state state from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts, utp_common_objects lncel, ROH_C_LTE_LNCEL C_LTE_LNCEL where lncel.co_oc_id = 3130 and lncel.co_parent_gid = lnbts.co_gid and lnbts.co_oc_id = 3129 and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and mrbts.co_oc_id = 3128 and C_LTE_LNCEL.CONF_ID = 1 and C_LTE_LNCEL.VALID_FINISH_TIME > SYSDATE and C_LTE_LNCEL.CO_GID = lncel.co_gid and mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid) target #tmp_meas_tables# where plmn.co_oc_id=16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and lncel.co_oc_id=3130 and mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and lncel.co_parent_gid = lnbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.eci_id = target.eci(+) and #first_tmp_table#.lncel_gid = lncel.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')')"MRBTS name", nvl(lnbts.co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "LNBTS_TYPE", nvl(lnbts.co_name, 'NN('||lnbts.co_gid||')')"LNBTS name", nvl(lncel.co_name, 'NN('||lncel.co_gid||')')"LNCEL name", target.plmn_name "Target PLMN name", target.rnc_name "Target RNC name", target.wbts_name "Target WBTS name", target.wbts_id "Target WBTS ID", target.wcel_name "Target WCEL name", target.lcr_id "Target LCR ID", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts, utp_common_objects lncel, (select wcel.co_gid gid, nvl (plmn.co_name, 'NN(' || plmn.co_gid || ')') plmn_name, nvl (rnc.co_name, 'NN(' || rnc.co_gid || ')') rnc_name, rnc.co_object_instance rnc_id, nvl (wbts.co_name, 'NN(' || wbts.co_gid || ')') wbts_name, nvl (wcel.co_name, 'NN(' || wcel.co_gid || ')') wcel_name, wbts.co_object_instance wbts_id, wcel.co_object_instance lcr_id, C_WCEL.wcel_cell_id ci_id, to_number(C_WCEL.wcel_mcc) wcel_mcc, to_number(C_WCEL.wcel_mnc) wcel_mnc, wcel.co_state state from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects rnc, utp_common_objects wbts, utp_common_objects wcel, ROH_C_WCEL C_WCEL where wcel.co_oc_id = 813 and wcel.co_parent_gid = wbts.co_gid and wbts.co_oc_id = 812 and wbts.co_parent_gid = rnc.co_gid and rnc.co_oc_id = 811 and C_WCEL.CONF_ID = 1 and C_WCEL.VALID_FINISH_TIME > SYSDATE and C_WCEL.CO_GID = wcel.co_gid and rnc.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid) target #tmp_meas_tables# where plmn.co_oc_id=16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and lncel.co_oc_id=3130 and mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and lncel.co_parent_gid = lnbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.tcid_id = target.ci_id(+) and to_number(#first_tmp_table#.hot_id) = target.rnc_id(+) and to_number(#first_tmp_table#.dmcc_id) = target.wcel_mcc(+) and to_number(#first_tmp_table#.dmnc_id) = target.wcel_mnc(+) and #first_tmp_table#.lncel_gid = lncel.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')')"MRBTS name", nvl(lnbts.co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "LNBTS_TYPE", nvl(lnbts.co_name, 'NN('||lnbts.co_gid||')')"LNBTS name", nvl(lncel.co_name, 'NN('||lncel.co_gid||')')"LNCEL name", target.segment_id "Target SEGMENT ID", target.segment_name "Target SEGMENT name", target.bts_name "Target BTS name", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts, utp_common_objects lncel, (SELECT sc_table.segment_id segment_id, NVL(sc_table.segment_name,'NN('||sc_table.segment_id||')') segment_name, bts.co_gid bts_co_gid, NVL(bts.co_name, 'NN('||sc_table.la_id_lac||' '||sc_table.cell_id ||')') bts_name, sc_table.cell_id ci_id, to_number(sc_table.la_id_lac) lac_id, to_number(sc_table.la_id_mcc_number) bts_mcc, to_number(sc_table.la_id_mnc_number) bts_mnc FROM utp_common_objects bts, ROH_C_BTS sc_table WHERE bts.co_oc_id = 4 AND bts.co_gid = sc_table.co_gid AND sc_table.valid_finish_time > SYSDATE AND sc_table.conf_id = 1 AND sc_table.master_bts = 1 AND sc_table.object_state = 1) target #tmp_meas_tables# where plmn.co_oc_id=16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and lncel.co_oc_id=3130 and mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and lncel.co_parent_gid = lnbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.tcid_id = target.ci_id(+) and to_number(#first_tmp_table#.lac_id) = target.lac_id(+) and to_number(#first_tmp_table#.dmcc_id) = target.bts_mcc(+) and to_number(#first_tmp_table#.dmnc_id) = target.bts_mnc(+) and #first_tmp_table#.lncel_gid = lncel.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')') "MRBTS name", sevr.severity "Severity", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr #tmp_meas_tables# where mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.mrbts_gid = mrbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')') "MRBTS name", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp #tmp_meas_tables# where mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.mrbts_gid = mrbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')') "PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')') "MRBTS name", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", alrm.alarm "Alarm", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp, (select alr.alarm_id, nvl(alr.text, 'NN('||alr.alarm_id||')') alarm from REPALS_D_ALARM_MEMBERS alr) alrm #tmp_meas_tables# where mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.mrbts_gid = mrbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_id = alrm.alarm_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')')"MRBTS name", nvl(lnbts.co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "LNBTS_TYPE", nvl(lnbts.co_name, 'NN('||lnbts.co_gid||')')"LNBTS name", lnbts.co_object_instance "LNBTS ID", sevr.severity "Severity", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr #tmp_meas_tables# where mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and plmn.co_oc_id=16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and #first_tmp_table#.lnbts_gid = lnbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')')"MRBTS name", nvl(lnbts.co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "LNBTS_TYPE", nvl(lnbts.co_name, 'NN('||lnbts.co_gid||')')"LNBTS name", lnbts.co_object_instance "LNBTS ID", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp #tmp_meas_tables# where mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and plmn.co_oc_id=16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and #first_tmp_table#.lnbts_gid = lnbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')')"MRBTS name", nvl(lnbts.co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "LNBTS_TYPE", nvl(lnbts.co_name, 'NN('||lnbts.co_gid||')')"LNBTS name", lnbts.co_object_instance "LNBTS ID", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", alrm.alarm "Alarm", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp, (select alr.alarm_id, nvl(alr.text, 'NN('||alr.alarm_id||')') alarm from REPALS_D_ALARM_MEMBERS alr) alrm #tmp_meas_tables# where mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and plmn.co_oc_id=16 and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and #first_tmp_table#.lnbts_gid = lnbts.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_id = alrm.alarm_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')')"MRBTS name", nvl(lnbts.co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "LNBTS_TYPE", nvl(lnbts.co_name, 'NN('||lnbts.co_gid||')')"LNBTS name", lnbts.co_object_instance "LNBTS ID", nvl(lncel.co_name, 'NN('||lncel.co_gid||')')"LNCEL name", sevr.severity "Severity", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts, utp_common_objects lncel, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr #tmp_meas_tables# where mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and lncel.co_parent_gid = lnbts.co_gid and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and lncel.co_oc_id=3130 and #first_tmp_table#.lncel_gid = lncel.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')')"MRBTS name", nvl(lnbts.co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "LNBTS_TYPE", nvl(lnbts.co_name, 'NN('||lnbts.co_gid||')')"LNBTS name", lnbts.co_object_instance "LNBTS ID", nvl(lncel.co_name, 'NN('||lncel.co_gid||')')"LNCEL name", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts, utp_common_objects lncel, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp #tmp_meas_tables# where mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and lncel.co_parent_gid = lnbts.co_gid and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and lncel.co_oc_id=3130 and #first_tmp_table#.lncel_gid = lncel.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #time#, nvl(plmn.co_name, 'NN('||plmn.co_gid||')')"PLMN name", nvl(mrbts.co_name, 'NN('||mrbts.co_gid||')')"MRBTS name", nvl(lnbts.co_sc_name, 'MacroBTS') "LNBTS_TYPE", nvl(lnbts.co_name, 'NN('||lnbts.co_gid||')')"LNBTS name", lnbts.co_object_instance "LNBTS ID", nvl(lncel.co_name, 'NN('||lncel.co_gid||')')"LNCEL name", sevr.severity "Severity", alrtyp.type "Type", alrm.alarm "Alarm", #keys#, #kpis# from utp_common_objects plmn, utp_common_objects mrbts, utp_common_objects lnbts, utp_common_objects lncel, (select sev.severity_id, nvl(sev.severity_name, 'NN('||sev.severity_id||')') severity from REPALS_D_SEVERITY_MEMBERS sev) sevr, (select typ.alarm_type_id, nvl(typ.alarm_type, 'NN('||typ.alarm_type_id||')') type from REPALS_D_ALARMTYPE_MEMBERS typ) alrtyp, (select alr.alarm_id, nvl(alr.text, 'NN('||alr.alarm_id||')') alarm from REPALS_D_ALARM_MEMBERS alr) alrm #tmp_meas_tables# where mrbts.co_parent_gid = plmn.co_gid and lnbts.co_parent_gid = mrbts.co_gid and lncel.co_parent_gid = lnbts.co_gid and mrbts.co_oc_id=3128 and lnbts.co_oc_id=3129 and lncel.co_oc_id=3130 and #first_tmp_table#.lncel_gid = lncel.co_gid and #first_tmp_table#.severity_id = sevr.severity_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_type_id = alrtyp.alarm_type_id and #first_tmp_table#.alarm_id = alrm.alarm_id #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

select #id_pivot#, decode(nvl(mr.co_name, nvl(mr.co_object_instance, 'NN ('||mr.co_gid||')')),' ','NN ('||mr.co_gid||')',nvl(mr.co_name, nvl(mr.co_object_instance, 'NN ('||mr.co_gid||')')))"MR Name", #kpis# from utp_common_objects mr #tmp_meas_tables# where mr.co_oc_id=109 and #first_tmp_table#.mr_gid = mr.co_gid #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by 2,1,3
select #id_pivot#, 1 WS_DUMMY, #kpis# from dual #tmp_meas_tables# where 1=1 #tmp_table_joins# #add_on_criteria# order by #add_on_sort#

group.name: PLMN/LTE_BAND
group.sql:
select lncel_gid, band from (SELECT CO_GID LNCEL_GID, CASE WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 0 AND 599 THEN 'BAND 1' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 600 AND 1199 THEN 'BAND 2' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 1200 AND 1949 THEN 'BAND 3' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 1950 AND 2399 THEN 'BAND 4' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 2400 AND 2649 THEN 'BAND 5' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 2650 AND 2749 THEN 'BAND 6' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 2750 AND 3449 THEN 'BAND 7' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 3450 AND 3799 THEN 'BAND 8' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 3800 AND 4149 THEN 'BAND 9' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 4150 AND 4749 THEN 'BAND 10' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 4750 AND 4949 THEN 'BAND 11' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 5010 AND 5179 THEN 'BAND 12' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 5180 AND 5279 THEN 'BAND 13' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 5280 AND 5379 THEN 'BAND 14'
WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 5730 AND 5849 THEN 'BAND 17' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 5850 AND 5999 THEN 'BAND 18' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 6000 AND 6149 THEN 'BAND 19' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 6150 AND 6449 THEN 'BAND 20' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 6450 AND 6599 THEN 'BAND 21' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 6600 AND 7399 THEN 'BAND 22' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 7500 AND 7699 THEN 'BAND 23' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 7700 AND 8039 THEN 'BAND 24' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 8040 AND 8689 THEN 'BAND 25'
WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 36000 AND 36199 THEN 'BAND 33' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 36200 AND 36349 THEN 'BAND 34' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 36350 AND 36949 THEN 'BAND 35' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 36950 AND 37549 THEN 'BAND 36' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 37550 AND 37749 THEN 'BAND 37' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 37750 AND 38249 THEN 'BAND 38' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 38250 AND 38649 THEN 'BAND 39' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 38650 AND 39649 THEN 'BAND 40' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 39650 AND 41589 THEN 'BAND 41' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 41590 AND 43589 THEN 'BAND 42' WHEN LNCEL_EARFCN_DL BETWEEN 43590 AND 45589 THEN 'BAND 43' ELSE 'BAND UNKNOWN' END BAND FROM ROH_C_LTE_LNCEL WHERE CONF_ID = 1 AND VALID_FINISH_TIME > SYSDATE AND OBJECT_STATE = 1)

group.name: PLMN/WS_LNBTS
group.sql: select w.setname ws, leg.la_co_gid ws_gid from w_manual_sets w, utp_legacy leg where w.int_id = leg.la_int_id and leg.la_object_class=3129

group.name: PLMN/WS_LNCEL
group.sql: select w.setname ws, leg.la_co_gid ws_gid from w_manual_sets w, utp_legacy leg where w.int_id = leg.la_int_id and leg.la_object_class=3130

group.name: PLMN/WS_MRBTS
group.sql: select w.setname ws, leg.la_co_gid ws_gid from w_manual_sets w, utp_legacy leg where w.int_id = leg.la_int_id and leg.la_object_class=3128
